msg: 冤獄求償有沒有懶人包?
受檢警酷刑有沒有求償的相關法規?
獄中受不當對待的申訴與求償機制有嗎？
受精神科病房不當對待，有什麼申訴的管道或是管理法規?
醫院洩漏病人個資有什麼求償的法規?
健保署對全國醫療病歷做統計研究報告，需不需要付錢給病歷資料提供者?
勞工職業災害現在由哪個單位進行調查認定?
役男依據個資法、憲法及人權公約拒服兵役，有沒有懶人包?
兵役體檢受到人格尊嚴損害求償有沒有懶人包?
因為核子試爆引起的地震而遭受生命財產損失，請求國家賠償，有沒有懶人包?
台灣什麼時候公佈全境內大規模毀滅性武器的資料?
原子能委員會現在由什麼單位在監督?
台灣的生化武器實驗室現在由什麼單位管理? 受什麼單位監督?
外國在台灣轉運核生化武器對台灣所造成的損害或是風險，可以依據什麼法規進行檢討調查?
外國轉運核生化武器對台灣所造成的損害有沒有外交途徑可以進行求償?
台灣國安局對人權造成的侵害的案件目前由哪個單位管理? 依政府資訊公開法，如果獲得資料?
國安局監聽資料依什麼法規在做管理?
國安局侵害人權的事情有沒有緊急處理的方式?
國安局危害公務員人身安全的行為如何究責及監督?
國安局的違法行為由什麼單位進行調查?
國家安全法與憲法及其他法律的衝突點，目前由什麼單位進行整理?
立法院法制委員會的職責有沒有盡到? 如果沒盡到，有什麼單位可以監督?
國防部所屬軍醫院涉嫌傷害罪的資料有沒有公佈?
檢察官依妨害兵役治罪條例起訴的案件資料有沒有監督調查的法源或監督單位?
依妨害兵役治罪條例所受的身心傷害，應由哪個單位統整通知受害人，並且進行賠償?
科技部的經費審查方式目前由什麼單位依照什麼標準在進修監督管理?
政府單位要求與職缺工作內容不相關的個資，有什麼法律可以要求刪除或是停止使用? 如果因政府洩漏個資造成公務員或民眾的損害，由什麼單位管理監督及補償?

台灣的國安局甚至可以操控立委、總統、及政府官員。威脅特定個人聽從秘密人士的指揮。

@sunflower_nobody  你所發出的問題似乎都不錯，但你從沒有明確點出你想做些甚麼事，這個頻道主要是要討論想要具體做什麼事的.... 你是否願意明確告訴大家你想做完成什麼，以符合頻道目的？
Taiwanese Government will threaten any specific individual who tries to check its democracy and human rights situation?
sunflower_nobody: 我覺得如果你明確說出你想完成什麼的話，或許能提高這些問題的回答率。不試試看嗎？
People can ask their own questions in the g0v community? Am I right?
sunflower_nobody: This is a very vague assumption. Would you clarify ?
Do I have to do so?
Who can represent the g0v community?
sunflower_nobody: I'd appreciate if you do
I ask questions. And there would be someone who can help. I think so. It is not my own questions. It is questions for everyone.
sunflower_nobody: That's good... but the evidently answering rate is pretty poor ... care to maximize ? perhaps some tweaks of  your strategy ?
If I ask these questions and I would be threatened by Taiwanese Government, then it could mean there's some problems in Taiwanese democracy system?
sunflower_nobody: I don't see how that's connected. Also I'd say that derails from the topic of this channel.
Please don't target me personally. It is not my own questions.
sunflower_nobody: Are you offended by they way I'm replying ?
g0v is a community to improve the transparency in governmental data as I know.
I am not asking a specific person in the g0v community. I ask for clarifying the problems.
There is freedom of speech in Taiwan as I know so far.
sunflower_nobody: yes I can see that they are posted openly. but I think we both agree that those questions are not mostly left unanswered.
And there is also personal information protection laws in Taiwan as I know.
As an individual without authorities asking questions would be a helpful way to check the governmental situation?
sunflower_nobody: Am I correctly understand your intention being  checking "governmental situation" ?
sunflower_nobody: I mean, by posting all those questions.
My intention would not be a real question. The question is itself
If I am not allowed to ask such general questions. And it would be meaningful?
sunflower_nobody: Thank you for sharing. It's an interesting approach.
sunflower_nobody: It's also a rather noisy one :-p  -- and do you think you get the answer you wish for ?
I think there are a lot of prefessional workers around the world who can help.
sunflower_nobody: Exactly how do you expect helps from them?
No any specific expectations.
難得回覆這麼多.....  往好處想.... 有進步 (?!)
sunflower_nobody: Or... how can other people hanging out in this channel help you to prove (or disprove) your intend ?
gugod: I don't know. And I am not asking just to you.
If I know some way to solve the problems, I would probably do it myself.
sunflower_nobody: what are the  "problems" are you referring to here ?
I am not sure if the questions are really problems?

sunflower_nobody: You mentioned that you would probably solve the "problems" yourself, but I couldn't find other prior references to this "problems" here. May you share with me about the real problem you are trying to solve ?
